Package com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.dto.response

Class DeliveryStatusResponse

java.lang.Object
com.sixbank.notificationlibrary.shared.dto.response.DeliveryStatusResponse
public class DeliveryStatusResponse extends Object
Response DTO that encapsulates the delivery status information of a notification. It contains summary counts of attempts, success/failure stats, timestamps, and details of individual delivery attempts.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeliveryStatusResponse

      public DeliveryStatusResponse()
      Default constructor.

    • DeliveryStatusResponse

      public DeliveryStatusResponse(String notificationId, String customerId, NotificationStatus overallStatus, List<DeliveryAttempt> deliveryAttempts)
      Constructs a DeliveryStatusResponse with the given notification ID, customer ID, overall status, and list of delivery attempts. It calculates summary statistics such as total attempts, success/failure counts, last attempt time, next retry time, and last error message.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - the notification's unique ID
      customerId - the customer ID receiving the notification
      overallStatus - the aggregated status of the notification delivery
      deliveryAttempts - list of detailed delivery attempt records
